item.title: GXT3 window masked behind GXT2 window
item.description: I ran into a little issue at work today and wanted to enter a brief write up on it. One of our web application's user interface is built on Sencha's GXT3 (com.sencha) and GXT2 (com.extjs) frameworks. Our new and improved UI uses GXT3 and we maintained legacy layouts and components (developed using GXT2) to permit a transition period for established users.
item.dc:creator: Rg
